meanings.sent1: The dog followed the cat down the street.
meanings.sent2: I always followed my sister to school.
meanings.sent3: The curious squirrel followed the mysterious sound into the forest.
meanings.sent4: Success followed her hard work like a shadow.
meanings.sent5: The detective followed the clues to solve the case.

meanings.definition: To come after in order, time, or position.
meanings.sent1: The dessert followed the delicious dinner.
meanings.sent2: The red car followed the blue one in the race.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected rain followed the sunny weather, ruining the picnic.
meanings.sent4: Laughter followed the comedian's jokes like music to the ears.
meanings.sent5: The cheers of the crowd followed the winning team.

meanings.sent1: The mess in the kitchen followed the baking session.
meanings.sent2: A big mess followed the party at the house.
meanings.sent3: Laughter followed the silly joke, echoing through the room.
meanings.sent4: Joy followed the good news, spreading smiles all around.
meanings.sent5: The delicious smell of cookies followed the baker wherever she went.
